name: HMCharacteristic
desc: A specific characteristic of a service, like the brightness of a dimmable light, or its color temperature.

items.name: var uniqueIdentifier: UUID
items.desc: A unique identifier for the characteristic.

items.name: var localizedDescription: String
items.desc: The localized description of the characteristic.

items.name: var properties: [String]
items.desc: An array of properties that describe the characteristic.

items.name: var value: Any?
items.desc: The current value of the characteristic.

items.name: func readValue(completionHandler: (Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Reads the value for the characteristic.

items.name: func writeValue(Any?, completionHandler: (Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Modifies the value of the characteristic.

items.name: func updateAuthorizationData(Data?, completionHandler: (Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Sets or clears authorization data used when writing to the characteristic.

items.name: var metadata: HMCharacteristicMetadata?
items.desc: Metadata about the units and other properties of the characteristic.

items.name: class HMCharacteristicMetadata
items.desc: Metadata that describes a characteristicâ€™s value and that may be useful for presentation purposes.

items.name: func enableNotification(Bool, completionHandler: (Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Enables or disables notifications for changes in the value of the characteristic.

items.name: var isNotificationEnabled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean indicating whether the characteristic has been set to send notifications.

items.name: var service: HMService?
items.desc: The service that contains this characteristic.
